method.name: Configure

method.name: GetHeaderInformation

functiontype.name: DistortionCallback
functiontype.description: A callback function for distorting a layer

class.name: LayerObject
class.description: In-memory representation of a layer object.

method.name: GetEntityCount
method.description: Returns count of Entity in Layer.

method.name: GetEntity
method.description: Returns a entity in a layer.

method.name: AddEntity
method.description: Adds a entity to a layer.

method.name: RemoveSelfIntersections
method.description: Removes self-intersections of a layer.

method.name: MergeInto
method.description: Merges layer into another layer object.

method.name: CalculateOffset
method.description: Calculates an offset to a layer.

method.name: ThickenPolylines
method.description: Thickens up polylines of a layer.

method.name: ThickenHatches
method.description: Thickens up hatches of a layer.

method.name: DistortLayer
method.description: Distorts a layer with a callback function

param.name: RefinementValue
param.description: Lines longer than this value are split up in smaller segments to not loose distortion information.

param.name: UserData
param.description: pointer to arbitrary user data that is passed without modification to the callback.

method.name: GetDPI
method.description: Returns DPI values in X and Y.

method.name: GetSize
method.description: Returns image sizes.

method.name: GetPixelSize
method.description: Returns image pixel sizes.

method.name: GetPosition
method.description: Returns image position.

method.name: SetPosition
method.description: Sets image position.

method.name: SetSubsampling
method.description: Set subsampling values in X and Y.

method.name: GetSubsampling
method.description: Returns subsampling values in X and Y.

method.name: SetSamplingParameters
method.description: Set sampling parameters of algorithm.

param.name: UnitsPerSubpixel
param.description: Units per subpixel. Line coordinates will be discretized with this value. Minimum 4, Maximum 1048576. Must be even.

param.name: PixelsPerBlock
param.description: Pixels per lookup block. Improves calculation speed. Minimum 4, Maximum 1024.

method.name: GetSamplingParameters
method.description: Returns sampling parameters of algorithm.

param.name: UnitsPerSubpixel
param.description: Units per subpixel. Line coordinates will be discretized with this value. Minimum 4, Maximum 1048576. Must be even.

param.name: PixelsPerBlock
param.description: Pixels per lookup block. Improves calculation speed. Minimum 4, Maximum 1024.

method.name: AddLayer
method.description: Adds a layer object to subsample.

method.name: CalculateImage
method.description: Calculates the image.

param.name: Antialiased
param.description: Image output is greyscale if true, black and white with 0.5 threshold if false.

class.name: SliceStack
class.description: In-memory representation of a slice stack.

method.name: GetLayerCount
method.description: Returns layer count of slice stack.

method.name: GetLayerThickness
method.description: Returns layer thickness of slice stack.

method.name: GetBottomZ
method.description: Returns Z value of bottom of slice stack in mm.

param.name: ZValue
param.description: Z-Value of bottom of slice stack

method.name: GetTopZ
method.description: Returns Z value of top of slice stack in mm.

param.name: ZValue
param.description: Z-Value of top of slice stack

method.name: GetLayer
method.description: Returns layer object for a given Z Value.

method.name: CreateSliceStack
method.description: creates an empty slice stack.

param.name: LayerCount
param.description: Number of layers. MUST be positive.

param.name: LayerThickness
param.description: Layerthickness in mm. MUST be positive.

method.name: CreateEmptyLayer
method.description: creates an empty layer object.

method.name: RegisterInstance
method.description: creates a new rasterization instance.

param.name: PixelSizeX
param.description: Pixel size in X. MUST be positive.

param.name: PixelSizeY
param.description: Pixel size in Y. MUST be positive.

param.name: DPIX
param.description: DPI in X. MUST be positive.

param.name: DPIY
param.description: DPI in Y. MUST be positive.

method.name: UnregisterInstance
method.description: destroys a rasterization instance. Instance MUST exist.

method.name: HasInstance
method.description: Checks if a rasterization instance exists.

method.name: GetInstance
method.description: retrieves an existing rasterization instance.

method.name: GetVersion
method.description: retrieves the binary version of this library.

param.name: Major
param.description: returns the major version of this library

param.name: Minor
param.description: returns the minor version of this library

param.name: Micro
param.description: returns the micro version of this library

method.name: GetLastError
method.description: Returns the last error recorded on this object

param.name: HasError
param.description: Is there a last error to query

method.name: ReleaseInstance
method.description: Releases shared ownership of an Instance

method.name: AcquireInstance
method.description: Acquires shared ownership of an Instance

method.name: InjectComponent
method.description: Injects an imported component for usage within this component

param.name: SymbolAddressMethod
param.description: Address of the SymbolAddressMethod of the injected component

method.name: GetSymbolLookupMethod
method.description: Returns the address of the SymbolLookupMethod

method.name: CreateDriver
method.description: Creates a driver instance with a specific name.

param.name: Name
param.description: Name of driver to be created.

param.name: Type
param.description: Type of driver to be created.
